creator: maxcoder

content:
Update:

A workaround was to create a new subfolder (named LocalFolders/Updated) and move all the local folders to the new subfolder.

Then do the update.

Moving all the folders back to the root of the local folders is a pain because you can no longer select multiple folders. But it worked around the issue for me.
creator: smoothpp

content:
1. How does it all look after Help > Troubleshoot Mode? 2. Set all your fonts and font sizes back to default 3. Check your settings for zoom and density https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/new-thunderbird-115-supernova#w_other-look-and-feel-improvements

Please post a screen shot
